definition: class/rank/grade/equal to/same as/to wait for/to await/et cetera/and so on/et al. (and other authors)/after/as soon as/once

sentences.english: This paper discusses a class of degenerate linear parabolic differential inequations.
sentences.chinese: 本文討論了一類拋物型變分不等式的近似收斂問題。

sentences.english: A set of inequalities which are related closely to the elliptic modular function will be set up in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文建立了一組與橢圓模函數密切相關的不等式。

sentences.english: The temperature deperdence of Polar Crystal Interface Polarons (PCOP) are disscussedy means of Bogolyubov inequality.
sentences.chinese: 本文利用不等式討論了界面極化子的溫度關係。

sentences.english: This paper presents a new alternating direction method for a class of variational inequalities.
sentences.chinese: 該文對於一類變分不等式提出了一種新的交替方向法。

sentences.english: This method could also be applied in super-differential inequalities and equations.
sentences.chinese: 所用的方法也適用於時超微分不等式及方程。

sentences.english: In this thesis we study generalization and application of the Furuta inequality.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要討論了關於古田不等式的推廣和應用。

sentences.english: The demonstration of inequality is inportant in mathematics research.
sentences.chinese: 不等式的證明是數學問題中常見的一類重要問題。

sentences.english: The corresponding results are all given in terms of linear matrix inequalities.
sentences.chinese: 相應的結果都是以線性矩陣不等式的形式給出。

sentences.english: The system with terminal inequality constrain has a dual-mode structure.
sentences.chinese: 終端不等式的引入使系統具有雙模控制結構。

sentences.english: Then the Lundberg inequality and the formula of the ruin probability are obtained.
sentences.chinese: 得出倫德伯格不等式和最終破產概率公式。

sentences.english: A convergence estimate and approximation for a kind of parabolic variational inequality is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文討論了一類拋物型變分不等式的近似收斂問題。

sentences.english: In this paper, we derive some combinatorial inequalities from the property of binomial coefficients.
sentences.chinese: 本文從二項式係數的性質得到了一些組合不等式。

sentences.english: The robustness analysis gives template parameter inequalities which guarantee the corresponding CNNs working well for performing prescribed tasks.
sentences.chinese: 魯棒性分析給出了完成相應功能的參數不等式。

sentences.english: An automated inequality proving algorithm is presented based on a mixed method including a so called cell decomposition.
sentences.chinese: 闡述了一個基於胞腔分解的不等式證明算法。

sentences.english: The contents of the second chapter are operator inequalities and norm inequalities.
sentences.chinese: 第二章的內容是算子不等式及範數不等式。

sentences.english: The contents of the second chapter are operator inequalities and norm inequalities.
sentences.chinese: 第二章的內容是算子不等式及範數不等式。

definition: discriminant (e.g. b^2-4ac in the formula for the roots of a quadratic equation)
